text:
Going into this, I had three concerns:

(1) Would this feel like a commercial?
(2) Would this suffer because of the hype?
(3) I hate CGI.

And the results were mixed.

While the film smartly used a certain amount of self-aware humor to side step some of the awkwardness of the product placement, it still had a few moments that felt somewhat more like advertising than storytelling. The random inclusion of the Millennium Falcon, for instance, felt somewhat shoehorned, andâ€¦
